sentence.Network_en: It takes many years to efface the unpleasant memories of a war.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多年后才能冲淡战争的不愉快记忆.

sentence.Network_en: The lapse of year will never efface that scene of ruins from my memory.
sentence.Network_cn: 时光的流逝绝不会把那废墟的景象从我的记忆中冲淡.

sentence.Network_en: He could not efface the impression from his mind.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不能把这个印象从心中抹去.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... deface v 毁坏；诽谤 efface v 擦掉；消除 ineffaceable a 不能消除的，抹不掉的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... ineffaceable a 不能消除的，抹不掉的 efface 抹掉+ facile a 容易做的.
e开头e结尾的单词_百度知道 ... eerie 怪异的 efface 抹去 eke 增加；放长.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... deface v 毁坏；诽谤 efface v 擦掉；消除 ineffaceable a 不能消除的，抹不掉的.

list.abs: They were both self - effacing ., 他们两人都十分谦逊.
She ' s brilliant but self - effacing ., 她才华横溢而不露锋芒.
Time effaced the memory ., 时间抹去了记忆.
effable 能被说出的efface oneself 自卑efface 抹掉
hardscape的意思中文翻译 ... efface 抹掉 efface oneself 埋没自己, 不露面 effacement 抹消, 抹杀.
time effaced the memory .时间抹掉了记忆。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'pardon or be absolved from (an offence)'): from French effacer, from e- (from Latin ex- 'away from') + face 'face'

entry.def: To efface something means to destroy or remove it so that it cannot be seen any more.

example.ex: ...an event that has helped efface the country's traditional image...
example.tran: 帮助该国改变了以往形象改观的事件

example.ex: The name of the ship had been effaced from the menus.
example.tran: 那艘船的名字已经从选择菜单中删除了。

means.word_mean: 1. remove completely from recognition or memory;

sentences.sentence: "efface the memory of the time in the camps"

means.word_mean: 3. remove by or as if by rubbing or erasing;

sentences.sentence: "Please erase the formula on the blackboard--it is wrong!"

auth_sentence.content: In tender Mercy Look on me, And all my Sins efface.
auth_sentence.res_content: In tender Mercy Look on me, And all my Sins efface.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In tender Mercy Look on me, And all my Sins efface.

auth_sentence.content: Since assuming power, Mugabe's avowed mission has been to efface Rhodes's legacy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Since assuming power, Mugabe's avowed mission has been to efface Rhodes's legacy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Since assuming power, Mugabe's avowed mission has been to efface Rhodes's legacy.

auth_sentence.content: She is told that she is still in early labor, three centimeters dilated, beginning to efface.
auth_sentence.res_content: She is told that she is still in early labor, three centimeters dilated, beginning to efface.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She is told that she is still in early labor, three centimeters dilated, beginning to efface.

stems_affixes.word_buile: facet[n.[问题等的]侧面,一面;[多面体的]面]+ious……的→做事表面化→轻浮的
in不+efface[v.擦掉,抹去]+able可以……的→adj.抹不掉的,不能消除的
efface[v.擦掉,抹去]+ment表名词→n.抹消, 抹杀
face脸,面→n.脸,面貌;表情;正面 v.面对着;朝,面向

stems_affixes.word_buile: inter在……之间+face脸,面→n.分界面, 接触面,界面

stems_affixes.value_cn: 损伤外观, 丑化, 使失面子

stems_affixes.word_buile: face脸,面→n.脸,面貌;表情;正面 v.面对着;朝,面向
ef出,出来+femin女人+ate……的→出现女人状态的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 能被说出的, 可表达的

stems_affixes.word_buile: ef出,出来+front前面+ery情况→脸面出去→不要脸
ef出,出来+face脸→从脸上去掉→擦掉
